Summary Note:

Lecomte Thiry Moens is a 33 year old and comes from Belgium.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.

Education Background:
Lecomte finished secondary school at Koninklijk Atheneum Berchem in 2011.

Occupation History:
Lecomte Thiry Moens is a 33 year old and comes from Belgium.
Lecomte Thiry Moens began his professional journey as a Analyst at Verlinvest SA in 2016, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Associate at PMV NV in 2020, further expanding his skill set.
